Description.Text: This accommodation has a small lobby.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Compulsory Tourism Dirham to be paid by guest directly to the hotel per room per night valid from 31st March 2014 Onward. No show and early checkout will be charged 100% of the reserved booking. No name change allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated.

Essential Information:
Early departure fee may apply Applicable from 24/May/2016 to 31/Dec/2025
Dubai Tourism Dirham Fee applies from 31.03.14 to be paid bythe guest directly at the Hotel/Hotel apartment. Following fee is applicable per bedroom per night- 20 Aed:5 star hotel/Deluxe hotel apart - 15 Aed:4 star hotel/Superior hotel apart-10 Aed :3 and 2 star hotel/Standard hotel apart-7 Aed :1 Applicable from 06/Jan/2016 to 31/Dec/9999
